title: Victory at Imola without leading a lap: the chaotic tale of Elio de Angelis' final F1 win
summary: The final laps of the 1985 San Marino Grand Prix have gone down as some of the most bizarre in F1's history â€” and the chaos didn't end with the chequered flag

qa_pairs.question: Which race is known for Elio de Angelis' final Formula 1 victory?
What unusual aspect characterized Elio de Angelis' win at the 1985 San Marino Grand Prix?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: He did not lead a single lap during the race.
wrong_options: He won by a large margin.
He crashed out but was declared the winner.
He had the fastest lap of the race.

qa_pairs.question: In which year did the San Marino Grand Prix, known for its chaotic ending, take place?
